title: Not able to Combine Mastery 6 Tokens
body: I got 2 mastery 6 tokens for garen but im not able to use them in Hextech crafting even though I own the champion....is this a techinal error?

replies.body: You need the tokens and either a Garen champion shard, champion permanent, or 500 blue essence in order to upgrade to mastery level 6.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TbnAzWgG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-11T05:18:45.867+0000)
>
> You need the tokens and either a Garen champion shard, champion permanent, or 500 blue essence in order to upgrade to mastery level 6.

What's a champion permanent? Like I said, i already own the champion. I ended up using 500 blue essense
A champion permanent is what you get when you re-roll 3 champion shards.

Following up on the info Zombiemaster has provided, you can find out more about Champion Mastery on [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
